MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete a repair due to a faulty underground cable on North Orchard Street, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:29PM on Thursday 31 December 2020.
